reviewText: I can not understand why warners does not put out the rest of Knots Landing. I really enjoyed this little taste of the show i have loved more than any other.

I purchased the and was very happy with it. It was transfered from a home recording, but well done. I really enjoyed it. I noticed amazon is selling the complete set of dallas for over three hundred dollars. I wold pay that for Knots. Please, realease...

For anyone who loved Knots Landing this mini-series is terrific. Best of all it brings back Donna Mills as Abby Fairgate Cunningham Ewing Sumner and reunites her with William Devane as Gregory Sumner. The pairing is fantastic! This couple really made one of the longest-running series on television compelling.
  THIS DVD NEEDS TO BE BACK ON THE MARKET NOW!!!
Not too bad, Kim Lankford is still gorgeous. Any chance of dvd release and another reunion.
